channel.title: Work at Cogneco on Cogneco
channel.description: Recent content in Work at Cogneco on Cogneco

item.title: Junior Frontend Engineer
item.description: As a Junior Frontend Engineer you will be a part of our growing development team. You will mostly be involved in front end development.

item.title: Junior Full Stack Engineer
item.description: As a Junior Full Stack Engineer you will be a part of our growing development team. You will be involved in both backend and front end development.

item.title: Failed to Submit Application
item.description: Sadly your application failed to be submitted. Please retry. If the error persist please email [mailto:career@cogneco.com career@cogneco.com].

item.title: Thank You
item.description: Thank you for your application. We will contact you by email once we have evaluated your application.
